subject: Medicine
title: Alternative Medicine and Placebos
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Alternative Medicine and Placebos.

hook.text: Many alternative therapies produce real relief for patients.

buildup.text: Acupuncture, homeopathy, and healing touch all have followers.

discovery.text: Controlled trials often show them equal to sham versions.

twist.text: Critics argue the ritual itself creates a powerful placebo.

climax.text: The debate centers on whether placebo-driven relief counts.

punchline.text: Real relief from an unreal mechanism.

quiz.question: What do critics say about many alternative therapies?
options: The ritual creates a placebo effect
